checks.label: avbctl Present
checks.command: command -v avbctl >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo present || echo absent
checks.description: avbctl binary available for rollback checks

checks.label: Rollback Index (slot 0) > 0
checks.command: command -v avbctl >/dev/null 2>&1 && avbctl get-rollback-index 0 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $NF}' || echo 0
checks.description: Anti-rollback index should be > 0 (slot 0) (INFO if avbctl unavailable)

checks.label: Rollback Index (slot 1) > 0
checks.command: command -v avbctl >/dev/null 2>&1 && avbctl get-rollback-index 1 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $NF}' || echo 0
checks.description: Anti-rollback index should be > 0 (slot 1) (INFO if avbctl unavailable)
